video_prompt:
**Prompt:**

Two anime-styled women, one large and one small, dynamically interact against a lightning-charged, deep blue background. Lightning flashes and glows. The smaller figure subtly adjusts her shirt, while the larger figure's ethereal silver hair shimmers with luminous highlights around her head. Their glowing eyes and subtle facial expressions shift, conveying an energetic, evolving fantasy.
image_prompt: Anime style digital painting: Two stylized women against a deep blue background with bright, electric blue lightning bolts. Left: Full-body, smaller figure of a young woman with short messy pink hair, blue eyes, fair skin, white graphic t-shirt, black shorts with pink accents, silver chain necklace, rings, and futuristic silver sneakers with glowing blue soles. Right: Larger, close-up of another woman's face and upper torso with long, glowing silver hair, pale skin, soft pink blush, large glowing blue eyes, lightly parted pink lips, subtle dark swirl tattoo above left eye, and a silver chain necklace over a white t-shirt. Energetic fantasy, modern edgy style.
refined_video_prompt: Dynamic interaction unfolds between the two figures. Lightning vigorously flashes and pulses, causing the backdrop to glow and ripple with dynamic color shifts. The smaller figure performs a subtle shirt adjustment. The larger figure's hair shimmers intensely, with luminous highlights evolving and rippling around her head. Their eyes glow with shifting intensity, and facial expressions continuously morph, expressing an energetic, evolving fantasy.
